body:
I recorded a whole game where I actually won (lag and all)! Of course, full diamond helped.
Cut to 4:10 if you don't want to watch the mining bit.
Thanks for watching!
http://youtu.be/CXunwEjvds0

Thank, folks!  I recently acquired 100 subs to my youtube channel and I will be releasing a celebration video soon!  I will post a new link when it's uploaded.

Thanks again for all who support my videos!  :)
